pr_title: Slight performance and acceptance test improvements and corrections

timeline.message:
Slight performance and acceptants test improvements and corrections

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Shorten error message and undo assert time change

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Moved subscribe error to complete message

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText:
Negative for now() is a bit weird. I would suggest changing it to boxed type and allowing null for now:
Long startTime = propHandler.getLongClientTestParam("StartTime", 0, null);
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText: Fixed. Updated some methods in PropertiesHandler to make this easier
replies.author: Nana-EC

timeline.bodyText: Should be "failed: " to avoid concatenating without a space in between
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

timeline.bodyText: Succes/failure with error should be at end of message.
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

timeline.message:
Updated PropertiesHandler to support nullable Long and Int types. Updated Sampler result logs and BDD feature test names to read better

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText:
imo, nanos precision seems unnecessary. Or maybe am missing some nuance?
(just a note, not changes needed)
timeline.author: apeksharma

replies.bodyText: This was an enhancement to help identify clients on the gRPC side. I use the timestamp for subscription to see which 1 out of say 200 clients got a specific error on the gaps server. Open to suggestions on another way to uniquely identify each client
replies.author: Nana-EC
